title: Hindustani Bhau Bigg Boss:Hindustani Bhau Joins Bigg Boss 13 As Wild Card Entry & Internet Has Declared Him The Winner Already
text:
Hindustani Bhau Joins Bigg Boss 13 As Wild Card Entry & Internet Has Declared Him The Winner Already

Hindustani Bhau Joins Bigg Boss 13 As Wild Card Entry & Internet Has Declared Him The Winner Already

Do you constantly check your social media accounts? Are you, too, addicted to memes just like me? If you are, you would sure know who Hindustani Bhau is!

The man is the most favourite meme material. He is a Tik-Tok and YouTube star, who is most fondly known as “Pehli Fursat” guy! His dialogue “pehli fursat mein nikal” has caught many people’s fancies.

Twitter

Bhau is Salman Khan’s great admirer, he revealed to him as Salman Khan hugged him. His real name is Vikas Fhatak and he is Sanjay Dutt fan. He even came to the show dressed up as his Vaastav’s character but he said he is now following Gandhigiri.

Don't Miss 1.5 K SHARES 135 SHARES 811 SHARES

Twitter

After Vikas aka Hindustani Bhau joined the show yesterday, internet declared him the winner already.

OMG #HindustaniBhau in Bigg boss house 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

He is the WINNER of #BiggBoss13.. 😍

Ye banda sabko pehli fursat me nikalega.... 😂🤣😂🤣😂🤣 — Astro-Numerologist Karan K Bhattrai (@being1karan) October 27, 2019

I've high hope from #Wildcard contestant #HindustaniBhau.If he will not give Maa-Behen ki Gaali,then #BB13 will be his season because all other housemates have not even 1% quality to be winner. Current Top two are #SidharthShukla-High Temper and #RashamiDesai-Liar! #BiggBoss13 — Astro-Numerologist Karan K Bhattrai (@being1karan) October 27, 2019

Wish Hindustani Bhau came as wild card in #BiggBoss13. He will win all the fights and tasks and can become first ever wild card to win the show.

Also this season can become interesting with his entry! 🎯🔥@EndemolShineIND @BiggBoss @ColorsTV @JessuGeorge #BB13 — Shivam (@itsShivam18) October 16, 2019

Likh ke Lelo , agar bhai ne maa behen ki gaali na de kaar game khela na . To bigg Boss 13 winner Wahi hoga . #hindustanibhau — subham nayak (@subhamn97830895) October 27, 2019

Don't underestimate #HindustaniBhau he is the probable winner. — Abhishek Awasthi 🇮🇳 (@AwasthiAbhi7) October 26, 2019

Aaj Hindustani Bhau ne phad dala pura,bole to ek daam rapchik💥🔥🔥👌

Sure shot winner of #BiggBoss13

Likh lo 🙏#HindustaniBhau — Badtameez ldka (@IAbhay_Rk) October 26, 2019

Bb13 winner hindustaniBhau hona chahiye bas ab mai tob dhekta bhi nhi pr fir bhi #HindustaniBhau — 👖 (@UnbaisedOpinion) October 26, 2019

Apart from Vikas, there was another wild card entry who joined the show yesterday -- Tehseen Poonawalla.

Twitter

He is an entrepreneur and a columnist who appears on news panels quite often. He is a hard-core Congress Supporter. So much so that he even disowned his brother Shehzad Poonawalla after the latter said that he had an issue with the party to media.

With Hindustani Bhau and Tehseen Poonawalla joining Bigg Boss 13, we are sure the TRPs are going to rise up even more.
description: Hindustani Bhau aka Vikas Fhatak who has joined Bigg Boss 13 as wild card contestant is Salman Khan’s great admirer, he revealed to him as Salman Khan hugged him. His real name is Vikas Fhatak and he is Sanjay Dutt fan. He even came to the show dressed up as his Vaastav’s character but he said he is now following Gandhigiri.
